Class TrainerImpl<E extends EstimationFunction>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainerImpl<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of EstimationFunction being trained
All Implemented Interfaces:
Trainer<E>
@Mediator @Strategy(CONCRETE) public class TrainerImpl<E extends EstimationFunction> extends Object implements Trainer<E>
Default implementation of the Trainer interface.

TrainerImpl wires together an Initializer, ObjectiveFunction, Optimizer, and Regime to execute a full training process for an EstimationFunction.

This class is typically not instantiated directly; instead, clients are encouraged to use the factory method Trainer.of(Initializer, ObjectiveFunction, Optimizer, Regime), which constructs and configures an instance of TrainerImpl.

The train(EstimationFunction, DataSet) method follows the canonical training sequence:

  1. Initialize the estimation function using the configured Initializer.
  2. Apply the configured Regime, which in turn uses the ObjectiveFunction and Optimizer to guide and update the estimation function during training.
See Also:

    Returns the optimizer used to update the parameters of the estimation function.
